content: this is a fun beginner friendly crochet santa hat topper pattern the pattern uses chunky yarn and is worked top down the hat is double brimmed to keep it stable when it s on top of your christmas tree the pattern includes some picture guidance for some aspects beginners may find a little trickier the pattern is for personal use only and may not be shared or reproduced without prior written consent copyright dora does limited registered in england no 13992263
